Unfortunately, his unique destiny attracts unwanted attention, leading him to leave the rural area where strange phenomena frequently occur. However, urban legends and supernatural tales continue to follow Wu FengXian.\n\nDespite his passionate spirit, Wu FengXian faces repeated setbacks due to his limited strength. Faced with the choice between exerting effort and taking it easy, he relies on his personal charm to opt for the latter. Wu FengXian, with a burning sense of justice, strives to save and protect the land passed down through generations, preventing the infiltration of the dark forces from Fengdu. Additionally, he seeks to cultivate a romantic relationship with his beloved sister. It was completed, but after many revisions, it was published eight years later, in 1776. It consists of an introduction in Chinese and five volumes and nine chapters, and is based on Chinese white-talk novels. A white story is a colloquial sentence, and Akinari refined the storytelling technique of the original work and wrote it in elegant sentences that make use of the story's fantastical scenes, while also containing the meaning of a warning against a frivolous society."},"links":{"mu":"43380"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}
02fdf3e3-d328-4b2e-9458-25b838142dee:::||@!@||:::2023-11-23T00:50:41:::||@!@||:::{"id":"02fdf3e3-d328-4b2e-9458-25b838142dee","title":{"en":"Tokaido Middle Knee Chestnut"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Toukaidouchuu Hizakurige"},{"ja":"東海道中膝栗毛"}],"relatedIds":["12b36398-0507-4629-96c1-ec1456a3c3cf","e2b4e84e-5eaa-4996-93ad-13f262fef632","f507cba8-2bfb-4ff2-ad2b-cbc8851c230f"],"description":{"en":"\"Tokaidochu Hizakurige'', which has spawned many imitation works as a typical humorous travel story, is a humorous book written by Ikku Jukkensha (Meiwa 2-Tenpo 2 [1765-1831 AD]), and its origin, consists of 18 books, from the first volume to the eighth volume. The first volume, ``Ukiyo Dochu Hizakurige,'' was published in 1802, and the upper, middle, and lower parts of the 8th volume were published in 1809, which is actually the latest to date. Published in 14). The Tokaido journey that begins with Tochimenya Yajirobei and Kitahachi, a former traveling actor, deciding to visit Ise Shrine, is filled with failures and humorous stories along the way, and the roads and customs of the city are also depicted. Ichiku himself had not planned on writing such a long story, but it was so well received that he continued to write 25 volumes, from the first volume to the 12th volume of Zoku Hiza Kurige, and the two of them moved to Edo. It will not be until 20 years later, in 1822, when the 12th edition was published."},"links":{"mu":"134605"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}}]}

Estudio, based on the telenovela of the same title. The comic was first published April 2006 and lasted only two issues due to conflicts caused by Ka-Boom's writers. Despite initial demand being high, the amateur writing team from Ka-Boom delivered the scripts for the first three issues months later than agreed, causing the art team trouble and also creating conflicts with Televisa's editorial representatives, which led to the cancellation of the title.\n\nThe series was advertised as being based on the style of Japanese manga, but it was only partially based on it."},"links":{"raw":"https://www.rbdfotos.org/index.php?/category/2434"},"originalLanguage":"es-la","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"a3c67850-4684-404e-9b7f-c69850ee5da6","name":{"en":"Girls' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

In order to overcome his weakness, he enrolls in Somenoe University, a highly selective university with a 90% female ratio. He finds himself living in a former women’s dormitory where there are only two men, including himself!! Nervous and anxious about his future life, Ren moves in with his senior classmates. On his first day at the dormitory, a senior female student, Kou, made him a visit at night! I will become the saint, make the gods eat shit, and annihilate them."},"links":{"mu":"rnp892s","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/65947762"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

In the Edo period (1603-1868), where the story takes place, most people who committed crimes were executed. One day, Saichiro, the son of a town doctor, is present when Yukinari slays a criminal. Later, Saichiro sees Yukinari ignoring his family members who are begging for the life of a criminal. 143ed116-c9cb-4755-80a8-706bcbadfb71:::||@!@||:::2025-02-20T01:04:40:::||@!@||:::{"id":"143ed116-c9cb-4755-80a8-706bcbadfb71","title":{"en":"Tonari no Seki no Inkya Joshi ga Oshi Utai Datta ~Ore no Kyoku wo Uttatekure!~"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"隣の席の陰キャ女子が推し歌い手だった ～俺の曲を歌ってくれ！～"},{"ja-ro":"Tonari no Seki no Inkya Joshi ga Oshi Utai Datta ~Ore no Kyoku wo Uttatekure!~"},{"en":"The \"Inkya\" Girl Sitting Next To Me Was My Favorite Singer. Sing My Song!"},{"vi":"Cô bạn trầm tính bàn bên hóa ra lại là ca sĩ mà tôi mến mộ ~Bài hát này của tôi, hãy hát lên đi nào!~"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["vi","en"],"description":{"en":"\"Why is my favorite singer singing my song!?\"\n\nTsunagu Kurose, a high school student with a passion for musics composing but a terrible singing voice, often receives criticisms whenever he posts them on the Internet. One day, while shouldering the responsibility of taking commemorative photos of the culture festival reluctantly with Otoha Hinomori - a quiet classmate sitting next to him, his childhood friend Tetsu Tamura was in a dilemma because of unavoidable accidents occuring on the stage run by his club. Without hesitation, Tsunagu gives him the demo instrumental songs he composed to save the situation. Unfortunately, Tetsu open the wrong music file with Tsunagu's terrible lyrics, making him feels like he wanna hole up due to that unfortunate disaster. In despair at this miserable situation, Otoha takes off her thick glasses, tightly grips the microphone and hums that song! \n\n\"Isn't this voice similar to icy - the singer I've always admired...!?\"\n(Source: Takeshobo, translated)","ja":"「どうして俺の曲を、憧れの歌い手が歌ってるんだ!?」\n高校生・黒瀬繋玖(くろせつなぐ)は、歌唱は微妙だが作曲してネットに投稿するのが趣味。\nある日隣の席の陰キャ女子・氷ノ守音羽(ひのもりおとは)と学園祭の写真係になる。\n当日友人のピンチに自分の楽曲を提供するが、流れたのは聴くに堪えないデモテープバージョン。\n悲惨な状況に絶望したそのとき、マイクを手に歌唱したのは地味眼鏡を外した音羽だった!\nその歌声は憧れの推し歌い手icyそのもので…!?","vi":"\"Tại sao bài hát của mình, lại được ca sĩ mình yêu thích hát vậy chứ!?\"\n\nTsunagu Kurose, nam sinh cấp ba với niềm đam mê sáng tác nhạc cùng giọng hát dở tệ, thường nhận phải gạch đá khi đăng tải chúng lên mạng. Một ngày nọ, trong lúc đang gánh vác công việc chụp những bức hình kỉ niệm ngày hội văn hóa bất đắc dĩ cùng cô bạn trầm tính bàn bên Otoha Hinomori, cậu bạn thưở nhỏ Tetsu Tamura đã rơi vào tình cảnh tiến thoái lưỡng nan vì một vài sự cố bất khả kháng diễn ra ngay trên sân khấu do CLB cậu điều hành. 42ffe9bf-014f-486c-a5fe-490809aadade:::||@!@||:::2025-02-20T01:04:42:::||@!@||:::{"id":"42ffe9bf-014f-486c-a5fe-490809aadade","title":{"en":"No kami ni somuita watashi wa amaku midarana wari o ukeru"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"処女信仰の神に背いた私は甘く淫らな罰を受ける"}],"lastChapter":"1","description":{"en":"A small rural town, Ahtiria. In this region, the teachings of virgin worship by the goddess Ahati are widespread.\nPre-marital sex is prohibited. It is said that a bride who completes her wedding as a virgin will receive the blessing of Ahati and be happy forever.\n\nTwo years have passed since Maya (the protagonist) moved to this town out of concern for her grandmother who lives alone.\nMaya and Lutz, a popular man in the town, became lovers and she dreamed of marrying him one day and becoming the happiest bride in the world.\nMeanwhile, Maya has been feeling a little uneasy about the fact that Lutz has been acting friendly with Serge recently.\n\n\"Mr. Serge---he's the mayor's son and seems to be a good person, but he's always silent and expressionless...I've never seen him smile.\"\n\nOne day, Maya is suspected of adultery and is imprisoned in a dungeon. A false accusation without any justification. Every day, the vaudeville hall was packed to capacity to see him. Umenojo was always pampered by the audience and the host, but there was one thing he lacked as a rakugo performer... and that was \"talent.\" A boy who continues to perform on stage despite having no talent, and a girl who has talent but cannot get on stage. 9fd06602-f6d5-4a9a-ad10-d4e142e3ffb8:::||@!@||:::2025-02-20T01:04:46:::||@!@||:::{"id":"9fd06602-f6d5-4a9a-ad10-d4e142e3ffb8","title":{"en":"Seikimatsu Tantei Club"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"世紀末探偵倶楽部"},{"fr":"Fin de Siècle Detective Club"},{"en":"End-of-the-Century Detective Club"},{"en":"Sherlock Holmes - Fin de Siècle Detective Club"}],"lastChapter":"3","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Seikimatsu Tantei Club is dedicated to the very gay and very passionate love of Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson. It's blatantly based on Conan Doyle's work, and many of his characters make appearances throughout the story. In fact, the main story is split into three sub-stories -- each one focusing on a different aspect of the Holmes/Watson relationship.The first story is titled Paris Fin de Siècle, and is a light-hearted introduction to our protagonists. There's a little fluff, a little humor, a sardonic reunion with Arsène Lupin, and a sexually charged scene of boot-licking. (Actual boot-licking. Not the metaphorical kind!) There are also fabulous kisses, cross-dressing criminals and unusual confessions. No smut so far, though. That comes later on. Oh, yes.The last two stories are based on actual Conan Doyle plots. The second story is based on and named after The Adventure of the Three Garridebs, and the third is similarly inspired by A Scandal in Bohemia. It's wonderful to see Conan Doyle re-interpreted through a yaoi mangaka's eyes! It's particularly rewarding to see Holmes undergo a paradigm shift after Watson is shot in The Three Garridebs; Holmes realizes that he can't take the good doctor for granted anymore, and that his old friend has become so much more than a friend to him."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/世紀末探偵倶楽部-四谷シモーヌ-ebook/dp/B00HF3FXDE","ap":"seikimatsu-tantei-club","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/232603/","kt":"seikimatsu-tantei-kurabu","mal":"9290","mu":"qcaxpvq"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

The world, after being plunged into nuclear war, is now a desert. The rule of law is might makes right. The weak suffer as bandits and warlords do as they please. Chaos runs amok and it seems there is no relief in sight.\n\nHowever, there is one man who stands against that. Alors que le désastre approche, Duan Jinghong se retrouve incapable de fuir et est contraint de collaborer avec Shen Tinglan sur \"l’affaire des seize préfectures perdues de Yunyou.\" Pour préserver sa \"pureté,\" il entre dans une confrontation d’esprit et de stratégie avec Shen Tinglan, où les hormones s’enflamment face à la raison."},"links":{"mu":"nisjpgc","raw":"https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc33520"},"originalLanguage":"zh","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Through his gentle demeanor and unparalleled expertise, Yutaka creates a serene, almost magical atmosphere where people can find solace. This is a heartwarming, slice-of-life story about the daily interactions between a thoughtful elf masseur and his unusual patrons in a hidden oasis of calm.
